Parallels.ab: bərəjā vaŋhə̄uš aṣ̌ahe bərəjā daēnaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ māzdaiiasnōiš = VrS65.15; ~ Y15.1 bərəja vaŋhə̄uš aṣ̌ahe bərəja daēnaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ māzdaiiasnōiš.

Ritual.ab: (The zaōtar performs the Yasna Haptaŋhāiti at the place of the frabərətar."

ab.em: u-š hamāg pad gāh ī zōtān gōwišn be yasn ī haft-hād cē ān ka pad gāh ī frabardārān ā šāyēd u-š abestāg pad barsom bē gōwišn u-š be šawišn u-š kār xūb be kunišn u-š abāz āyišn u-š dast abar barsom nihišn u-š ōh rāyēnišn

Ritual.ab: He has to recite all text at the place of the zōt, except the Yasna Haptaŋhāiti, for , when (he recites) it at the place of the frabardār , it is allowed. He has to say the abastāg to the barsom. He has to go (to the place of the frabardār), perform correctly his duty and come back, put his hand on the barsom and continue the recitation."
At ahurəm mazdąm he has to turn it around (the fire).
At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā he has to remove it (from the fire).
